name: Woodland (Pixel Beef, yarenlen, PixelPete)
description:
Your dog ran away. Find him with the power of music!

Play with Gamepad (A, B, X, Y, RT) or Keyboard (1, 2, 3, 4, Space)

Hint: There are 3 places your dog loves: His favourite place near your home were he hides his bones, the food bowl in front of the neighbours house and the Eastern Pond hidden deep in the forest. 

Done in 48h at Global Game Jam 2021 in Bayreuth.

Theme: Lost and Found | Diversifier: Happy Place

Featuring Woodland palette by Orbitron and Jason Shaw's song Acoustic Meditation (CC-BY)
